views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 13

ABetterPrivacyforWhatsApp gives you Various Enhancement options useful for your Privacy and Aesthetic on WhatsApp.

See Screenshots below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Configure options from Settings.

Credits in Preferences Panel.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.4.7 - Added the option to Bypass the Touch/Face ID Lock on Launch (Featured ByeWALockToOpen Available on My Repo). - Added the option to Hide/Disable All the Contacts View. Version 1.4.6
- Added Support for the Latest WhatsApp Version 2.19.92.
Version 1.4.5
- Added Support for Last WhatsApp Version 2.19.70.
- Added the option to Disable the Send Message Button.
- Added the option to Remove the Dates Chat Bubbles
Version 1.4.3
- Added the option to Custom Choose the Colors for the Input Chat Buttons.


Version 1.4.2
- Added support for arm64e/A12.
Version 1.4.1
- Added the Possibility to Show which Message got Deleted with an Indicator when the Read Delete/Revoke Messages option is Enabled.


Version 1.4.0
- New and Better Dark Mode For WA option (Code Improved).
- Added the Label inside Preferences Panel to Launch WhatsApp on your Device with Ease.
Version 1.3.9
- Added the option to Always Read the Received Deleted/Revoked Messages for All on Your Device (included iCanReadYOU on My Repository).
- Added the option to Save Download the Status Media (Photo, Video, Gif) into Your Device Photo Albums (included iCanSaveYOU on My Repository).
- Added the option to Hide Your Typing inside the Chats.
- Added the option to Remove the Dates Bubbles Blur (thanks patch by @albyvar25).
- Fixed the Hide on Line Status/Typing option not Fully Working on the Last Update.
Version 1.3.8-1
- Fixed the issue with Enable Square Pictures/Thumbnails option occurred on the Last Update.


Version 1.3.8
- Compatible with Last WhatsApp Version 2.19.50 and iOS 12 (Not arm64e yet).
- Improvements.
Version 1.3.7
- Added the option to Remove the Times Limit when Stories Viewing (as Requested via Twitter/Mail).
- Fixed the option to Hide the Chat List Header Cell View.


Version 1.3.6
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).

(More Colors WA UI Customization to Come Next soon! )

- Now you can Custom Select the Colors for the Background of your Text Messages in Chats (Idea ported from my Tweak WAMessageYellowBG available on My Repository.
- Now you can Custom Select the Colors for the Background of your Text Input View in Chats.
- Now you can Custom Select the Colors for the Background of your Chat List Header.
- Added the option to Hide the Chat List Header Cell View (as Requested via Twitter/Mail).
- Code Changes/Improvements for iOS 11.
Version 1.3.5
- Added the option to Hide the Hide Microphone Tooltip (thanks patch by A_H_Rabie).
- Added the option to Stop the Continuous Vocals Playback in Row.


Version 1.3.4
- Added the option to Hide the GIF/Other app Search Pickers in the Media Gallery View.
- Fixed the Media Gallery View Crash when Enabled the Dark Mode Feature for WhatsApp.


Version 1.3.3
- Added the option to Enable the Dark Mode for WhatsApp (As Requested, the Feature is kind of Beta at this moment).


Version 1.3.2
- Added the option to Enable the Unlimited Media/Photos Sending in Chats.
- Added the option to Enable the Call Confirmation in Chats.
- Added the option to Enable the Video Call Conformation in Chats.
Version 1.3.1
- Added the option to Hide the Stickers Contents in Chats.
- Added the option to Hide the Caret in Chats while Typing.
- Fix Code.
Version 1.3
- Fixes for Latest Versions of WhatsApp.
- General Enhancements.
Version 1.2.9
- Added the option to Remove the Forwarded Icon in the Conversations (thanks cHAuHaN).

- WhatsApp made major changes to their code base in latest update 2.18.90. Itâ€™s going to take some time to fix everything. DO NOT UPDATE (quote @FouadRaheb).
Version 1.2.8-1
- Fixed the Hide Archived Chats Feature not working on iOS 11.3.1 reported by Mail.


Version 1.2.8
- Added the option to Disable the Top Buttons Bar (iOS 11).
- Issue Fixes.
